name: Verifying if create job api is able to create inwarranty job

steps.name: Creating Inwarranty Job with Create Job API
Setting up the BaseURI, Content Type as Application/JSON and attaching the SensitiveData Filter for a role and attaching payload
Getting the Property Value from the config file
Getting the Auth token for the role
Getting the Property Value from the config file

parameters.name: paylaod
parameters.value: CreateJobPayload[mst_service_location_id=0, mst_platform_id=2, mst_warrenty_status_id=1, mst_oem_id=1, customer=Customer[first_name=Madelyn, last_name=Bartell, mobile_number=316-628-5442, mobile_number_alt=, email_id=Willie43@yahoo.com, email_id_alt=], customer_address=CustomerAddress[flat_number=302, apartment_name=Brigade Gateway, street_name=Dr. Rajkumar Road, landmark=Orion Mall, area=Rajajinagar, pincode=560055, country=India, state=Karnataka], customer_product=CustomerProduct[dop=2025-08-24T18:30:00.000Z, serial_number=25394561160803, imei1=25394561160803, imei2=25394561160803, popurl=2025-08-24T18:30:00.000Z, product_id=1, mst_model_id=1], problems=[Problems[id=2, remark=Smartphone is running slow]]]
